lines.text:
[Opening intertitle]
Hollywood - 1928. The magic empire of the Twentieth Century! The Mecca of the World!
Why are you not in uniform?
Perhaps it is your courage that is weak.
It doesn't require courage to send others to battle and death.
[the angry Duke uses his crop to whip Andreyev across the face]

[about the Duke]
Let him strut a little longer. His days are numbered!

[Listening at the door to what he perceives to be the Duke's seduction of Natali]
That sort of thing should always be done after caviar.

[Seeing an extra having a false beard applied by a make-up man]
Is that beard supposed to be Russian? It looks like an ad for cough drops!

[Demanding Natalie from a revolutionary]
That woman belongs with me. She goes with the coat!
